title: Framed Data
text: Engineered a dashboard displaying machine learning data and statistics with Clojure, ClojureScript, and Om (React.js)
Created data visualizations and accompanying statistical analyses on the back-end
Maximized user understanding of complex machine learning data by devising and building UX improvements
Built an internal dashboard for evaluating accuracy of machine learning predictions with D3.js
Drove product management and design of numerous dashboard features

title: WebAction
text: Architected, designed, and programmed a user-customizable dashboard displaying visualizations of large quantities of data in real-time
Designed front-end codebase to efficiently parse large quantities of data client-side
Implemented a front-end build process using Grunt.js

title: Hackbright Academy
text: Hackbright is a 10 week, full-time intensive Python and web development fellowship
Learned Python, Django, Flask, SQL, and front-end technologies

Built applications such as a movie rating prediction system implementing Pearson's r, K-nearest neighbor, and Euclidean distance, a to-do list using Flask, and a program that generates text in the style of a particular author using Markov chains

title: Ranganath Lab, UC Davis
text: Conducted fMRI, EEG, eye-tracking, and behavioral cognitive neuroscience studies
Analyzed experimental data in Python and Matlab and administered server system
